name: Old Fashioned Mac and Cheese
author: JAYDE175
summary: This is a classic recipe for macaroni and cheese. The kids will love this!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Prepare the elbow macaroni according to package directions
Meanwhile, melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium high heat
Stir in the flour until a cream colored paste forms
Then pour in the milk and stir constantly until this comes to a hard boil, then stir for 1 more minute
Remove from heat and set aside
When the macaroni is cooked, spread 1/2 of it into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish
Then layer 1/2 of the grated onion, 1/2 of the salt and pepper and 1/2 of each of the cheeses
Repeat this one more time: macaroni, onion, salt and pepper and cheeses, and then pour the reserved white sauce over all
Top off with small pats of butter to taste
Cover and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes
